key_features: 8% cash back on petrol and private commute spend
6% cash back on dining and groceries spend
0.2% cash back on all other retail spend
Up to 23.64% savings at Caltex, Esso and Shell
Up to S$1,000,000 coverage when you charge your travel tickets to the card

With Citi PayAll, you can earn and accumulate Citi Miles, Citi ThankYou PointsSM or Cash Back quickly when you pay your big-ticket bills such as rent, insurance premiums, education expenses, taxes, utilities and more. T&Cs apply.

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.
petrol: Best for: Petrol transactions at Caltex, Esso and Shell
Base cashback rate: 0.2% on all petrol transactions
An additional 7.8% cashback will be applied to your petrol transactions if you spend at least S$800 on your card per statement month
Eligible petrol merchants include service stations, and automated fuel dispensers worldwide
Caltex Discount: 17% instant discount at Caltex on all Techron® fuels and 8% cash back with Citi Cash Back Card (on nett purchase after discounts)
Esso Discount: 5% Esso station site discount + 5% Esso Smiles card discount + 4% Citi Card discount + 8% cash back (on nett purchase after discounts) = Total of 20.88% savings effectively
Shell Discount: 5% Shell station site discount + 5% Shell GO discount + 4% Citi Card discount + 8% cash back (on nett purchase after discounts) = Total of 20.88% savings effectively

With Citi PayAll, you can earn and accumulate Citi Miles, Citi ThankYou PointsSM or Cash Back quickly when you pay your big-ticket bills such as rent, insurance premiums, education expenses, taxes, utilities and more. T&Cs apply
cash_back: Base cashback rate: 0.2% on all retail purchases
An additional 5.8% cashback will be applied to your dining and groceries transactions if you spend at least S$800 on your card per statement month
An additional 7.8% cashback will be applied to your private commute and petrol transactions if you spend at least S$800 on your card per statement month
Total cash back is capped at S$80 combined across all retail spend per statement month
Up to 23.64% savings at Caltex, Esso and Shell
Cashback earned will be accumulated and automatically credited to your credit card statement when it reaches S$50. You will also be able to track your cashback earned on the Citi Mobile App

eligibility: MoneySmart Exclusive Promotion is valid from 01-March 2025 to 31-March-2025
Applicable for New-to Citibank Cardmembers only
Activate the approved Eligible Card via the Citi Mobile App and spend a minimum of S$500 which falls under “Qualifying Spend” within a 30-day period inclusive of account approval date.
Log into your MoneySmart account and submit your claim by 30th April 2025

fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: 1% plus 1% of any outstanding unbilled instalment amounts plus interest charges plus late payment charge or S$50, whichever is higher
